mapper.insert: insert into fm_member values( #{m_name}, #{m_sex}, #{m_birthday}, #{m_nationality}, #{m_id}, #{m_pwd}, #{m_email}, #{m_tel}, null, null )
mapper.select: select m_id, m_name from fm_member where m_name=#{m_name} and m_email=#{m_email}
mapper.delete: delete from fm_member where m_id=#{m_id} and m_pwd=#{m_pwd}
mapper.update: update fm_member set m_name=#{m_name}, m_sex=#{m_sex}, m_birthday=#{m_birthday}, m_nationality=#{m_nationality}, m_email=#{m_email}, m_tel=#{m_tel} where m_id=#{m_id}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select * from fm_member order by m_id desc) a) b where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
select bookingdate from fm_hos_book where hos_bid=#{hos_bid} and bookingdate like ''||#{date}||'%'
select checkin, checkout from fm_hot_book where name=#{name} and (to_char(checkin,'yyyy-MM-DD')) like ''||#{date}||'%' or (to_char(checkout,'yyyy-MM-DD')) like ''||#{date}||'%'
